daily_fact: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: Over two dozen people were hospitalized following a Brooklyn apartment fire, while an armed man disrupted a Wikipedia conference in NYC; additionally, heavy rain is expected to affect Monday's commute, and thousands rallied against Trump in a citywide protest.
